module.title: UI: Image: Slider
module.description:
Model and renderer for image sliders.
You can create sliders having at least one image, called slide. Each slider can have different settings, like animation type or show time per slide.
Prepared sliders can be inserted by shortcode:
code>[shortcode id="1"]<code
module.log: Initial prototype.
Refactoring to Hydrogen Module.
Added title layer.
Added scale to fit option.
Added view counter.
Updated database tables.
Added hook View:onRenderContent to inject slider into static content.
Added base path.
Fixed bug in slider animation time calculation.
Improved slider hook onRenderContent.
Changed slide size ratio calculation and use on window size change.
Added slide content in database for later use.
Added slide timestamp.
Refactoring to support multiple instances.
Updated database to allow negative slide status.
No buttons, dots and animation for sliders with less than 2 slides.
Apply link to slider title too, if slider has a link.
Added power switch for view helper.
Made slider path configurable.
Add fade animation.
Fix bug on having several instances in one page.
Add mandatory relation to module JS:jQuery:easing to complete easing support.
Migration from protected SVN repository.
Improve code style and doc blocks.
Reduce former SQL install scripts to one finale script.
Make prefix for CSS classes and JavaScript IDs variable.
Extract hook to own class and refactor to use module UI:Shortcode.
Add model entity classes.

module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>sliders`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>sliders` ( `sliderId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creatorId` int(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `width` decimal(4,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `height` decimal(4,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `path` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `durationShow` decimal(5,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `durationSlide` decimal(5,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `animation` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `easing` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'linear', `randomOrder` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `showButtons` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `showDots` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `showTitle` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `scaleToFit` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `views` int(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sliderId`), KEY `creatorId` (`creatorId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>slider_slides`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>slider_slides` ( `sliderSlideId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sliderId` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `source` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `link` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `rank` decimal(2,0) DEFAULT '0', `timestamp` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sliderSlideId`), KEY `sliderId` (`sliderId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `source` (`source`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>sliders`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>slider_slides`;
